resources.string: Welcome to Wings n Sides, the home of the best wings in Lagos Come enjoy the best of American Southern Hospitality mixed with the cultural rhythms and flavors of New York to the heart beat of Lagos, Victoria Island. Our wings come naked or slightly coated and tossed to perfection in the most amazing flavors. From all time classics—honey BBQ and Sweet Chipotle; our specially created flavors—Waffle Yaji and Coconut Island. Select from more than 20 delicious and tantalizing flavors and more than 15 different sides. Ours is the ultimate wings. What are you waiting for, you will be spoilt for choice. Order your wings today and spoil to palate!!
